title: Software Engineer (UI)
description:
**Role Summary:**
 Angular UI developer involved and driving the modernization of the market leading wealth management trading and portfolio management platform. You will help us take the product to the next level and be involved in new product development.
   

  

**What does a great Angular UI Developer do?**
* Works closely with front and back\\-end developers, product management and design to build user interfaces with simplicity and visual appeal.
* Has a passion for front\\-end development to ensure the end result meets client demands while maintaining integrity of InvestCloud philosophy. Is curious and asks questions to understand user’s preferences, motivations, needs and pain points in order to deliver best in class product
* Enjoys solving problems individually and as part of a team. Should know not just the “what” but also the “why” of technologies and frameworks.
* Responsible for coding the design layout to meet user specifications.
* You are all about test driven development, testing newly coded design across the platforms and browsers and validate it is fully functional and meets client demands
* Proactively track and analyze elements and variables to identify ways to improve the product


**As an Angular UI Developer, you can look forward to** 
 :
   

  

 Working with one of the market leaders in design driven thinking and development, evolving, and building market leading wealth tech product user experience.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications for Consideration:**
* Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or in a relevant field.
* 3\\+ years developing software in Angular 2 or later (we're using Angular 15\\). Extensive knowledge of TypeScript.
* Must have computer science skills: Analysis of Algorithms (time complexity and space complexity analysis), Data Structures, Object Oriented Programming, Design Patterns, and Problem\\-Solving skills.
* Demonstrable skill at writing RxJs pipelines. You should be familiar with numerous operators and how they can be used to solve real\\-world problems.
* Extremely comfortable writing and maintaining automated unit tests in Jasmine.
* Continuous Integration practices should be second nature to you.
* Basic familiarity with Git
* Excellent communication skills in written and spoken English
* Experience debugging JavaScript and CSS in the browser
* Ability to adhere to written coding standards and best practices.
* Ability to give and receive code reviews.
* Understanding of HTML and CSS fundamentals
* Solid understanding of RESTful APIs
* Proven ability to be curious and delve into product to create an effective user experience


**Preferred Qualifications for Consideration:**
* 1\\+ years of working with Git
* 1 or more years of experience with Bootstrap/Material/Kendo or similar frameworks.
* Experience with Jira and Azure DevOps
* Strong knowledge of Clean Code.
* Experience working with Reactive Forms.
* Experience with NgRx.
* Experience with automated E2E testing.
* Experience with SASS or LESS
* Experience with Postman or equivalent tool
* Experience mentoring less\\-senior developers.
* Experience with WCAG 2\\.1 AA standards.


**About InvestCloud**
 Headquartered in Los Angeles with a global presence, InvestCloud develops first\\-class, financial digital solutions, pre\\-integrated into the cloud. By empowering investors and managers with a single version of the integrated truth through its unique digital platform, InvestCloud creates beautifully designed client experiences and intuitive operations solutions using an ever\\-expanding library of digital modular apps. The result? Powerful products for individual investors and institutions alike, assembled on\\-demand to meet clients’ specific needs.
   

  

*InvestCloud is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.*

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About InvestCloud**
 InvestCloud, a global leader in wealth technology, aspires to enable a smarter financial future. Driving the digital transformation of the wealth management industry, the company serves a broad array of clients globally, including Wealth and Asset Managers, Wirehouses, Banks, RIAs, and Insurers. In terms of scale, the company’s clients represent more than 40 percent of the $132 trillion of total assets globally. As a leader in delivering personalization and scale across advisory programs, including unified managed accounts (UMA) and separately managed accounts (SMA), the company is committed to the success of its clients. By equipping and enabling advisors and their clients with connected technology, enhanced intelligence, and inspired experiences, InvestCloud delivers leading digital wealth management and financial planning solutions, complemented by a dynamic data warehouse, which scale across the complete wealth continuum. In 2024, InvestCloud was named a CNBC World’s Top Fintech Company, a proof point of the company’s commitment to innovation and client success. Headquartered in the United States, InvestCloud serves clients around the world. For more information, visit InvestCloud.com.
   

  

**Our Values**
* Client Connected
* Human Centered
* Technology Forward
* Respect \\+ Integrity
* Excellence


 The individual will be a problem solver with a keen eye for detail, an understanding of agile development processes and experience in a selection of coding languages. They will have proven experience as a software developer, software engineer or similar role and be open to learning new languages and technologies.
   

  

 This role will be accountable for the development of the TradeFlow User Interface applications, including both feature and maintenance releases. They will also proactively identify improvements to the development processes to reduce defects and improve delivery.
   

  

 The individual must be able to articulate and convey complex concepts to stakeholders within the organization with simplicity and concise language. An understanding of the post\\-trade process or similar financial experience would be advantageous.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications for Consideration:**
* Educated to a Degree level from an accredited university with minimum 8 years equivalent work experience


**Essential Skills, Experience, and Education:**
* Java (Servlets, OO)
* JavaScript
* HTML
* CSS
* Understanding of relational databases

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Turing is a leading organization based in San Francisco, California, dedicated to advancing frontier artificial intelligence research and deployment. As a research accelerator for cutting\\-edge AI labs and a trusted partner for global enterprises, Turing specializes in providing high\\-quality data, sophisticated training pipelines, and top\\-tier AI researchers. The company's expertise spans software engineering, logical reasoning, STEM disciplines, multilinguality, multimodality, and autonomous agents. Turing's mission is to accelerate AI innovation while helping enterprises transform AI proof of concept into reliable, impactful solutions that generate measurable business results. With a focus on reliability, scalability, and innovation, Turing is at the forefront of shaping the future of AI technology and applications.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Turing is seeking experienced Full Stack Developers to join its dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in developing modern solutions that power AI products and evaluation workflows. Your primary focus will be on building and maintaining high\\-quality JavaScript and TypeScript services and user interfaces, utilizing your expertise in Node.js/Nest.js and modern frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue. You will collaborate closely with AI researchers and data scientists to design evaluation pipelines, improve code quality, and contribute to datasets and evaluation processes that ensure language models align with real\\-world user needs. This is a unique opportunity to work on impactful projects at the intersection of AI research and software development, contributing to the evolution of frontier AI systems.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in full\\-stack web development with advanced proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript (ES6\\+). Experience with Node.js and Nest.js is essential, along with familiarity with at least one modern frontend framework such as React, Angular, or Vue. Candidates should demonstrate a solid understanding of web application architecture, testing best practices, and writing maintainable, readable code. Experience in scalable, modular development is highly desirable. A bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is required, or equivalent practical experience. Strong problem\\-solving skills, excellent communication abilities in English, and the capacity to collaborate asynchronously with global teams are also key qualifications.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and sustain high\\-quality JavaScript and TypeScript services and user interfaces tailored for AI training and evaluation workflows.
* Design, implement, and oversee evaluation pipelines, ensuring thorough documentation of rationales, methodologies, and improvements.
* Participate in the creation and refinement of supervised fine\\-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) datasets, contributing to process enhancements.
* Conduct comprehensive code reviews across the development stack to uphold high standards of code quality, readability, and maintainability.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate frontend and backend components seamlessly, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and best practices in full\\-stack development and AI evaluation techniques.


**Benefits**
 This position offers flexibility with remote work, allowing you to work from anywhere and on your own schedule. You will have the chance to contribute to groundbreaking AI products that influence how AI interacts with users worldwide. The role provides a unique opportunity to gain experience at the forefront of AI research and full\\-stack development, enhancing your professional growth. Additionally, working with Turing means being part of a forward\\-thinking team dedicated to innovation, excellence, and impactful solutions in artificial intelligence.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Turing is committed to fostering an inclusive environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe in diversity and are dedicated to creating a workplace where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered to contribute their best.

title: Junior Embedded Systems Engineer
description:
**Company Description**

 Perimattic specializes in providing comprehensive technology solutions, offering services such as data science, AI development, full\\-stack development, and web development. With a focus on optimizing business efficiency and scalability, Perimattic delivers high\\-performance digital products tailored to diverse industry needs. Known for innovation, the company develops advanced tools like AI\\-powered systems, predictive analytics, and secure software solutions. Dedicated to empowering businesses, Perimattic supports organizations in navigating the evolving digital landscape through cutting\\-edge technology. Headquartered in Jaipur, the company fosters a collaborative approach to building future\\-ready solutions.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time hybrid role for a Junior Embedded Systems Engineer, located in Jaipur, with flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home arrangements. The role involves designing, developing, and testing embedded systems, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and working on Internet of Things (IoT) projects. The responsibilities include software development, debugging, hardware integration, and ensuring compliance with project specifications. The candidate will contribute to creating innovative, efficient, and scalable embedded software solutions that integrate into a wide range of applications.
   




**Qualifications**

* Familiarity with Internet of Things (IoT) technologies and applications
* Experience in hardware and software integration for embedded systems
* Familiarity with testing, debugging, and troubleshooting embedded systems
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field
* Prior experience or internships in embedded systems development is a plus

title: QA Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Applicantz is a leading technology solutions provider committed to delivering innovative and high\\-quality software products to clients across various industries. As a recognized global player, Applicantz leverages cutting\\-edge technologies and a talented team of professionals to develop solutions that drive digital transformation and business growth. The company fosters a dynamic and inclusive work environment, emphasizing continuous learning, collaboration, and excellence. With a strong reputation for innovation and integrity, Applicantz is dedicated to empowering organizations worldwide through its advanced technological offerings and exceptional customer service.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled QA Automation Engineer to join our team on a long\\-term contract basis. In this role, you will be responsible for developing, enhancing, and maintaining automated testing frameworks to ensure the delivery of high\\-quality software products. You will collaborate closely with engineering and product teams to define testing strategies, implement automation scripts, and integrate testing processes into our CI/CD pipelines. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in automation testing using Cypress and Playwright, with expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on complex projects in a fast\\-paced environment, utilizing the latest testing tools and methodologies to improve product quality and release efficiency.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The successful candidate should possess a solid foundation in automation testing and software development. Key qualifications include hands\\-on experience with Cypress and/or Playwright, proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript, and familiarity with API testing frameworks such as Postman. Strong debugging, analytical, and problem\\-solving skills are essential. Exposure to performance testing, visual regression testing, and BDD frameworks like Cucumber is highly desirable. Candidates should also have experience integrating automation testing within CI/CD pipelines and a good understanding of cross\\-browser and cross\\-platform testing principles. A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is preferred, along with relevant certifications in automation testing or DevOps practices.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop, enhance, and maintain automated test scripts using Cypress and Playwright to support functional, regression, and end\\-to\\-end testing activities.
* Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define testing strategies, acceptance criteria, and quality standards for releases.
* Design and implement cross\\-browser and cross\\-platform automation suites to ensure compatibility across various environments.
* Integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines, monitor pipeline stability, and troubleshoot issues to maintain continuous delivery workflows.
* Create and maintain comprehensive test reports, dashboards, and quality analytics to track testing progress and identify areas for improvement.
* Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve automation failures efficiently, ensuring minimal impact on project timelines.
* Promote best practices in QA automation, contribute to process improvements, and stay updated with industry trends and new testing tools.


**Benefits**
 Applicantz offers a competitive benefits package designed to support the professional and personal growth of its employees. This includes flexible work arrangements, opportunities for continuous learning and certification, and a collaborative work environment that values innovation. Employees have access to cutting\\-edge technologies and tools, enabling them to develop their skills and contribute meaningfully to impactful projects. The company also promotes a healthy work\\-life balance and provides comprehensive health and wellness programs. Additionally, team members are recognized and rewarded for their contributions, fostering a motivating and engaging workplace culture.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Applicantz is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are dedicated to creating a workplace where everyone feels valued, respected, and empowered to succeed. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Our hiring practices are designed to ensure fairness and equal opportunity for all qualified candidates, and we actively promote diversity and inclusion across our organization.

title: Junior Data Engineer
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 1 November 2025
   

  

**Title:** 
**Data Engineer**
**Overview**
 A Data Engineer plays a crucial role in designing, building, and maintaining the infrastructure that powers our data\\-driven decisions. You’ll be at the heart of our data ecosystem, ensuring data is reliably collected, stored, and processed to provide clean, accessible data for our analytics and business intelligence teams.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design \\& Develop Data Pipelines: Assist in building, maintaining, and optimizing scalable ETL/ELT data pipelines to ingest and transform large datasets from diverse sources, including APIs, databases, and third\\-party systems.
* Data Modeling \\& Warehousing: Support the development of robust data models and schemas in both relational and cloud\\-native data warehouses (e.g., Google BigQuery).
* Ensure Data Integrity: Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve the performance and reliability of data pipelines, ensuring data quality, consistency, and accuracy.
* Data Source Integration: Work with various data formats and sources, including structured, semi\\-structured, and streaming data.
* Data Governance \\& Security: Collaborate with senior engineers to enforce data governance, quality, and security standards across the organization.
* Code \\& Automation: Write clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code (SQL, Python) for data engineering tasks. Utilize Git and CI/CD principles for version control and automated deployments.
* Team Collaboration: Document data workflows and contribute to a shared knowledge base, providing ad\\-hoc support to data analysts and business users.


**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field.
* Professional Experience: 1\\-3 years of hands\\-on experience in a data engineering or similar role.
* Technical Proficiency:
* Communication \\& Soft Skills:
* Availability: Able to join immediately.

title: Lifesight - Quality Assurance Engineer - Manual/Automation Testing
description:
**About Us**
 Lifesight is a fast\\-growing SaaS company focused on helping businesses leverage data \\& AI to improve customer acquisition and retention.
   

  

 We have a team of 130 serving 300\\+ customers across 5 offices in the US, Singapore, India, Australia, and the UK.
   

  

 Our mission is to make it easy for non\\-technical marketers to leverage advanced data activation and marketing measurement tools that are powered by AI, to improve their performance and achieve their KPIs.
   

  

 Our product is being adopted rapidly globally and we need the best people onboard the team to accelerate our growth.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 We are looking for a QA Engineer who will be responsible for building and enhancing the testing infrastructure, driving automation, and ensuring product quality at scale.
   

  

 Youll define and implement automation frameworks, execute regression suites, and validate non\\-functional requirements in collaboration with architects and development leaders.
   

  

 By reproducing complex scenarios, analyzing live site feedback, and improving test coverage, you will play a key role in strengthening our testing culture and delivering a reliable, high\\-performing product in the e\\-commerce data marketing automation space.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Define and implement testing infrastructure and automation framework needs.
* Drive improvements in test coverage based on live site feedback and characterization of patterns of issues in the product.
* Ensure the best automation and quality engineering practices are adopted and followed across the organization.
* Build and execute regression suites.
* Be hands\\-on with technology stack, test automation frameworks and tools used by the team and can lead by example.
* Work closely with architects and peer leaders in development to validate nonfunctional requirements of the product at scale
* Build and enhance testing infrastructure enabling unit, system, integration and load testing execution.
* Follow the strong testing culture in the organization.
* Work with the engineering and support teams to reproduce complex scenarios reported by customers.
* Develop subject matter expertise in product, technology and business in the domain of ecommerce data marketing automation.


**What We Are Looking For**
* Have worked or developing tools or frameworks to test complex micro\\-services, client applications and systems at scale
* Are working or testing with distributed architecture
* Have the experience in industry best practices in development processes.
* Have the ability to make decisions independently
* Have the ability to communicate and manage stakeholders effectively
* Aspire to grow as a lead engineer in a product\\-based company
* Good to have cloud knowledge
* Good to have Measurement platforms knowledge


**Experience**
* Have experience of 3\\+ years in Manual Testing and 2\\+ years in Automation Testing and 3\\-5 years of overall experience.


**Heres What You Can Expect**
* Early impact \\- Help shape the tech stack and build products from the ground up.
* Agile culture \\- Small teams, zero bureaucracy.
* Great benefits \\- Competitive pay, health insurance, daily breakfast, weekday lunches, Friday team lunch, Fun OClock Fridays, and unlimited coffee, tea \\& snacks

title: Data Scientist
description:
**About The Company**
 Azilen Technologies is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering innovative and customized digital solutions to clients across various industries. With a strong focus on leveraging the latest advancements in technology, Azilen Technologies aims to transform businesses by enhancing operational efficiency, fostering growth, and creating competitive advantages. The company prides itself on its collaborative work environment, commitment to excellence, and a customer\\-centric approach that ensures the success of every project undertaken.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Software Developer to join our dynamic team at Azilen Technologies. The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining high\\-quality software solutions that meet client requirements and industry standards. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborate with talented professionals, and contribute to the technological growth of the organization. The Software Developer will be responsible for translating technical specifications into functional applications, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring the seamless integration of new features into existing systems.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Proven experience in software development, with proficiency in programming languages such as Java, C\\#, Python, or JavaScript.
* Strong understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
* Experience with web development frameworks, databases, and version control systems.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
* Strong communication skills to collaborate with cross\\-functional teams and clients.


**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement software applications according to project specifications and standards.
* Collaborate with project managers, designers, and other developers to deliver high\\-quality solutions within deadlines.
* Write clean, scalable, and efficient code, adhering to best practices and coding standards.
* Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
* Test and debug applications to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
* Maintain and update existing software applications, incorporating new features and improvements.
* Participate in requirement analysis and contribute to technical documentation.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve development processes.


**Benefits**
 Azilen Technologies offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the well\\-being and professional growth of our employees. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and paid time off. We also provide opportunities for continuous learning through training programs, workshops, and certifications. Our work environment encourages innovation, collaboration, and a healthy work\\-life balance. Additionally, employees have access to modern tools and resources to facilitate their work and career development within the organization.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Azilen Technologies is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees and applicants are treated with respect and fairness, regardless of race, gender, age, religion, national origin, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. We believe that diversity enhances our ability to innovate and succeed, and we strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive and contribute to our shared goals.

title: Lifesight - Lead Backend Engineer - Java/Spring Boot
description:
**Description**
**Company Overview :**
 Lifesight is a fast\\-growing SaaS company focused on helping businesses leverage data \\& AI to improve customer acquisition and retention.
   

  

 We have a team of 130 serving 300\\+ customers across 5 offices in the US, Singapore, India, Australia, and the UK.
   

  

 Our mission is to make it easy for non\\-technical marketers to leverage advanced data activation and marketing measurement tools that are powered by AI, to improve their performance and achieve their KPIs.
   

  

 Our product is being adopted rapidly globally and we need the best people on board the team to accelerate our growth.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 The ideal candidate is a self\\-motivated, self managed and a multitasker, and demonstrated team player.
   

  

 You will be a lead developer responsible for the development of new software products and working on improving numerous non\\-functional requirements of the products as well.
   

  

 If youre looking to be a part of a dynamic, highly\\-analytical team and an opportunity to hone your java, cloud engineering and distributed system skills, look no further.
   

  

 As our Senior Software Engineer for the platform team, you will be handed the reins to build the core microservices.
   

  

 Along with building services to query billions of rows in Googles BigQuery, you will be in charge of building scalable APIs to build user segments and evolve architecture to send millions of notifications through varied streams like Email, SMS, in\\-app notifications per day.
   

  

**What Youll Do**
* Be responsible for the overall development of the modules/services that you will be working on.
* Code, design, prototype, perform reviews and consult in the process of building highly scalable, reliable, and fault\\-tolerant systems.
* As our senior software engineer continuously refactor applications and architectures to maintain high\\-quality levels.
* Continue to stay abreast of the latest technologies in distributed systems, caching and research new technologies, tools that enable building the next generation systems.
* Act as an engineer that enjoys writing readable, concise, reusable, extensible code every day.
* Discuss, articulate requirements with product management and scope, execute the feature road map.
* Participate in teams hiring process by being a panelist in interviews.


**What Youll Need**
* Ideally 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in designing, developing, testing, and deploying large scale applications, microservices in any language or stack (preferably java, Springboot).
* Good knowledge in one or more of these areas : Cloud, NoSQL stores; we use Google Cloud, Kubernetes, BigQuery, messaging systems.
* Excellent attitude and passion working in a team with willingness to learn.
* Experience in building low latency, high volume REST API requests handling.
* Experience in working in distributed caches like Redis.
* Ability to Get Stuff Done !


**Bonus Points If**
* Experience in containerization technologies like Docker, Kubernetes.
* Experience working in any cloud platforms (preferably GCP).
* Experience in NoSQL stores (like Cassandra, Clickhouse, BigQuery).


**What Is In It For The Candidate**
 As a team, we are concerned with not only the growth of the company, but each others personal growth and well being too.
   

  

 Along with our desire to utilize smart technology and innovative engineering strategies to make peoples lives easier, our team also bonds over our shared love for all kinds of tea, movies \\& fun filled Fridays events with a prioritizing healthy work\\-life balance.
   

  

* Working for one of the fastest growing and successful MarTech companies in times.
* Opportunity to be part of an early member of the core team to build a product from scratch starting from making tech stack choices, driving and influencing the way to simplify building complex products.
* Enjoy working in small teams and a non bureaucratic environment.
* Enjoy an environment that provides high levels of empowerment and space to achieve your Objectives and grow with organization.
* Work in a highly profitable and growing organization, with opportunities to accelerate and shape your career.
* Great benefits apart from competitive compensation \\& benefits.
* Above all a fun working environment.

title: Data Scientist
description:
**About The Company**
 Recro is a leading innovator in the field of artificial intelligence and machine learning, dedicated to developing cutting\\-edge solutions that transform industries. Our company specializes in creating advanced generative AI models that enhance multimedia experiences across text, audio, and video modalities. With a focus on research\\-driven development, Recro strives to push the boundaries of what is possible with AI, delivering impactful products and services to clients worldwide. Our collaborative and inclusive culture fosters continuous learning, innovation, and excellence, making Recro a dynamic place for talented professionals to grow and make a significant impact in the AI landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and hands\\-on Data Scientist to join our AI/ML R\\&D team at Recro. This full\\-time position is ideal for professionals with 4\\-10 years of experience in applied AI/ML, particularly those with a deep understanding of transformer architectures and generative models. The role involves working on diverse projects across text, audio, and video modalities, with opportunities to specialize in one area while maintaining versatility across others. You will lead end\\-to\\-end development, from research and experimentation to deployment, contributing to innovative solutions that advance our multimedia AI capabilities. The ideal candidate thrives in a fast\\-paced, research\\-driven environment, demonstrates ownership of projects, and is passionate about pushing the frontiers of generative AI technology.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* 4\\-10 years of professional experience in applied machine learning and data science, with a focus on generative AI.
* Strong foundational knowledge of transformer architectures, training dynamics, and model optimization techniques.
* Hands\\-on experience with large language models (LLMs), diffusion models, and multimodal architectures.
* Expertise in at least one modality—text, audio, or video—with proven end\\-to\\-end project delivery.
* Proficiency in Python programming and experience with frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlow.
* Experience with deployment frameworks like FastAPI or model servers for scalable deployment.
* Ability to design and implement automated evaluation pipelines for generative outputs across multiple modalities.
* Adaptability to rapid experimentation, learning new tools, models, and techniques swiftly.


**Responsibilities**
* Develop and fine\\-tune transformer\\-based models, including LLMs, Whisper, diffusion models, LoRA, RLHF/SFT, and multimodal systems.
* Prototype, benchmark, and explore the limits of emerging generative AI techniques to enhance multimedia outputs.
* Apply domain\\-specific knowledge to improve audio applications such as lip\\-sync accuracy, emotional delivery, and regional language support.
* Advance video applications by ensuring character and scene consistency, smooth motion, and high\\-quality outputs comparable to leading products like Veo3 and Sora.
* Extend language models to support regional languages and develop domain\\-adapted, fine\\-tuned models for specific use cases.
* Build automated evaluation pipelines for assessing audio, video, and image quality, ensuring continuous improvement.
* Optimize models and systems for a balance between speed, quality, and computational efficiency.
* Experiment with cross\\-modality integration, including audio\\-video synchronization, background score generation, and text\\-to\\-video alignment.
* Stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI models, tools, and techniques through ongoing research and experimentation.
* Take ownership of projects from conceptualization through deployment, demonstrating problem\\-solving skills and accountability.


**Benefits**
* Competitive salary package commensurate with experience and expertise.
* Flexible work arrangements including hybrid and onsite options.
* Opportunities for professional growth and continuous learning through exposure to cutting\\-edge AI research.
* Comprehensive health insurance and wellness programs to support your overall well\\-being.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment that encourages creativity and initiative.
* Participation in impactful projects that shape the future of multimedia AI technology.


 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Recro is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds, regardless of race, gender, age, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. We believe that diversity enhances innovation and drives our success, and we are dedicated to providing a work environment where everyone can thrive and contribute to our shared goals.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer

 Cloud Storage, Big Table, AlloyDB, CloudSQL

 The primary objective of this project is to unify the e\\-commerce experience into a single, best\\-of\\-breed platform that not only caters to the current needs but also sets the stage for seamless migration of other e\\-commerce experiences in the future

**Nice to have**
 Please see assumptions

**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization, and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Sr. Software Engineer- 3.5 Yrs to 6Yrs , Java Fullstack
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose\\-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Visa’s Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world’s most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you’ll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
   

  





 The Role
   

  





 Are you passionate about conceptualizing, nurturing, developing, and proving new ideas and developing them into new solutions? Would you like to help re\\-invent the internal business processes with the latest technologies and re\\-imagine the way things operate?
   

  





 We’re looking for a seasoned individual to drive game\\-changing innovation within Visa’s internal processes and ecosystem. You should have experience in multi\\-skilled teams capable of rapid prototyping of new ideas as well as scale these to commercial solutions. You and your team will be at the forefront of strategic partnerships, breakthrough technologies, new ideas, hackathons, demos, and rapid prototyping. You will work closely with business development teams, partners, and internal product teams and cross\\- leverage engineering talent internally and externally.
   

  





 Responsibilities
   

  




* Be at the heart of developing new ideas into demo\\-able products, and ultimately to commercial product
* Work directly with product owners, UX, engineering and other partner teams to gather and refine requirements across products, adding and taking into account existing tools and solutions across the organization
* Drive rapid prototyping cycles from technical requirements, software designs, programming, debugging, and optimization
* Explore and innovate new technologies, features, and tools
* Consult on a regular basis with leadership to align expectations and deliverables
* Be scrappy and work with the small team to the fullest to work on multiple parallel POCs and incubation efforts
* Able to scale the successful pilots to full commercial solutions
* Develop and design advanced architect solutions that are robust and scalable, considering integrations with other solutions across the internal technical ecosystem.
* Use stubs as needed to simulate capabilities lighting up soon
* Work collaboratively across team boundaries to share common infrastructure and functional capabilities. Provide feedback into core product teams to influence their roadmap and strategy
* Leverage AI technologies as\\-appropriate in day\\-2\\-day development and in production systems
* Provide domain expertise on the development of technical documentation of solutions and contributes to standard processes in technical documentation as needed
* Play a key role in the development and delivery of new features across products from end\\-to\\-end



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications
   

  

 2\\+ years of relevant work experience and a Bachelors degree, OR 5\\+ years of relevant work experience
   

  

  

  

 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

 Passion for innovation, new ideas, quick prototyping, hackathons etc.
   

  

 Prior work exploring and innovating new IP, genres, and product experiences
   

  

 Professional experience in ideation and incubation which has led to shipping products
   

  

 Multi\\-disciplinary skills and experience in ideation, software design, programming, debugging, and optimization
   

  

 Proven skill set and track record in developing one\\-line ideas into products
   

  

 Strong written and verbal communication skills
   

  

 Self\\-motivated and drive for excellence
   

  

 Have an open\\-minded approach to development strategy and approaches
   

  

 Capable of building culture for innovation
   

  

 Technical hands\\-on skills, ideally in multiple technology stacks for web development, APIs and Mobile application development on diverse platforms
   

  

 Hands\\-on and up to date with Gen AI and Agentic AI technologies and space
   

  

 10\\+ years of software engineering experience
   

  

 2\\+ years of experience in technical leadership roles with increasing responsibility
   

  

 MS or BS in Computer Science or equivalent
   

  

  

  

 Bonus Qualifications
   

  

 Prior experience working with Agentic AI systems.
   

  

 Prior experience working in a start\\-up or at VC firms in a “Resident Entrepreneur” capacity
   

  

 Financial services and/or payments processing industry experience is a plus
   

  

 Patents and other proofs of past success in creating IP
   

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Mendix Lead Developer
description:
* Primary skills:Next Gen\\-\\>Mendix


 A day in the life of an Infoscion
   

  

* As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high\\-quality and value\\-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages\\- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment.
* You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.
* You will identify change Management requirements and propose a structured approach to client for managing the change using multiple communication mechanisms.
* You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.
* You would be a key contributor in unit\\-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high\\-quality, value\\-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!
* Good knowledge on software configuration management systems
* Strong business acumen, strategy and cross\\-industry thought leadership
* Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends
